Thaddeus.description: Whenever the target of your Shield of Faith is hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes rad spell dmg equal to triple your bonus outgoing healing
The bonus AC for upcasting your Shield of Faith is increased by 2. Additionally, it needs 2 fewer slot levels per upcast bonus.
The Healer feat's heal action now has a range of 10'.
After 5th level, the Healer feat's heal action scales in die count every 5 levels instead of 6.

Zacharias.description: Your Magic Missile base force damage is converted to necrotic damage, and if all darts target the same creature, you heal 2 HP.

Siggusmondo.description: The first time in a turn a creature fails a saving throw from you, you may trigger your Gathered Swarm.

Vehemir.description: Your Speak with Animals now lasts 8 hours
Allies can Help you with animal handling checks you make with beasts you are communicating with via Speak with Animals
Vehemir.upgrade: +4 to these Helped animal handling checks/1
